name: Rhythm Jump
description:
Welcome to Rhythm Jump, combining two great game genres into something abominable!

Jokes aside, my game is a combination of a platformer and a rhythm game, where using the music to guide your jumps is key to beating each level!

Controls are simple -- Space to jump, Escape to quit.

Having your sound on is highly recommended, if not necessary to play, so hopefully you enjoy the music!

This game was made in 48 hours, entirely by me, for the Ludum Dare 41 game jam.
